description:
To the woman that told me I was a disgrace to the right because of my “prison tats” and that I’d “be prettier if I smiled”.....

To the man that called me racist....

To the woman who told me I didn’t care about the black community....

To the man that told me I looked like a toe....

To the countless people who unfollowed me, but still watch my stories....

To the people who won’t say hi in public to me but know what I was grateful for this morning....

To the people who think that belittling me works....

To the people that send my social media around to others calling me a tin foil hat conspiracy theorist....

Y’all don’t know the fire in my soul that all of that gives me! So for that, I say thank you!!!!
